scenes.background: Monica and Bob are discussing the celebration planning.
scenes.description: Monica says, 'Balancing between fun and formality sounds tricky.'

options.text: We can make it work if we plan well.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the challenge and showed good social skill, but perception, self-regulation, empathy, and motivation were moderate.

options.text: It's possible with a mix of activities.
options.analysis: You showed good perception and empathy by suggesting a mix of activities, but social skill and self-regulation were lower.

options.text: Maybe we should focus on one clear theme.
options.analysis: You suggested focusing on one theme, showing good motivation, but other dimensions were moderate.
